humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: Based on the pathology report, all seven assessed sentinel lymph nodes have no evidence of tumor (0/7). Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0, as there are no metastatic carcinomas in the sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there were seven sentinel lymph nodes excised, and none of them had evidence of tumor (0/7). Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N0.
